ReturnPolicy.Description: RETURN POLICY: The Buyer must notify Seller -through an eBay message- within 2 days of confirmed delivery receipt of the item with the return request. Buyer will be issued a “Return Authorization Number” at this time. This number must be included with your return. Upon return inspection of the item, your purchase price will be refunded, MINUS the initial shipping cost paid by the seller plus a restocking fee of 20% of your purchase price for our labor/materials. The item must be returned within 14 days of the original confirmed delivery receipt date and must be in the exact same condition as when it was shipped. The Buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs -NO EXCEPTIONS. To protect both parties on a returned item, it must be shipped via a service that provides a tracking/delivery confirmation number. Items must be returned UNUSED and in the original condition as sent. All retail store tags and/or our store security tag and band must remain attached. Care cards, instructions, accessories and/or packaging must be intact. Sealed items cannot be opened and must still be sealed. NO EXCEPTIONS - Worn items or items with the tags removed cannot be returned. Refunds will be issued within 3 days of receipt of the item and full adherence to our return policy. Any questions about this policy should be sent through eBay messaging.
